donate(uint256).details: adds up msg.value received to campaign

endCampaign(uint256).details: marks campaign as completed & sends amount to owner

extendCampaign(uint256,uint256).details: mints a Fundraiser NFT with given metadata & Stores requiredAmt to Struct mapped using tokenId

params.extendAmt: add extra amount to existing Campaign

startCampaign(string,uint256).details: mints a Fundraiser NFT with given metadata & Stores requiredAmt to Struct mapped using tokenId

withdraw(uint256,uint256).details: withdraw give amount,also reduce that from required & currAmt

endCampaign(uint256).notice: end the campaign and withdraw all
